q: of Forrester Research in California, described Nokia's partnership with Microsoft as a "big risk" because it could alienate the application developers who had been working on products for Nokia's Symbian and yet-to-be-released MeeGo platforms. They have to convince all those developers to stay put and it may not work, he said in an interview in London. "Nokia's challenge is to make Windows Phone their next priority." same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. Republican 2012 presidential hopefuls to appear at the annual gathering. Michele Bachmann , a Minnesota Republican, is set to keynote the March for Life Rose Dinner Monday night.
